amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 336, which strikes the requirement for the Secretary of Defense to submit a report on the vulnerability to military installations and combatant commander requirements resulting from climate change over the next 20 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-217 to strike section 336, relating to climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 234 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 234 (Roll no. 368).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Perry.
